author: Juan Meyer
description: Bittersweet with cleansing citrus sourness. Vanilla and bourbon notes combine well with gentian. Ap√©ritif in style.
name: The Healer
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
7.5 ml Licor 43 (or other spiced vanilla liqueur)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass (preferably a chunk of block ice)
